quest.descFameUI: $map:02020004$ is a key strategic location and it's occupied by Tairen. Go there and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020402$.

quest.name: Indelible Smell
quest.desc: $npcName:25020303$ poison has a singularly unique—and persistent—smell. Collect $item:30001223$ in $map:02020006$ so that Sky Fortress can invent a cleaning solution to get rid of the stench.
quest.descFameUI: Collect $item:30001223$ in $map:02020006$ so that Sky Fortress can invent a cleaning solution to get rid of $npcName:25020303$ stench.

quest.name: Acts of Aggression
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020503$ are big, strong, and mean. Go to $map:02020001$ and defeat them.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020503$ are big, strong, and mean.

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you deserve to be a member of Sky Fortress.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: Monster of the $map:02020017$
quest.desc: A familiar monster has appeared around the $map:02020017$. Go to $dungeonTitle:23038002$ in $map:02020017$ and defeat $npcName:23090006$.
quest.manual: Go to $dungeonTitle:23038002$ in the $map:02020017$ and clear the dungeon by defeating $npcName:23090006$
quest.descFameUI: Go to $dungeonTitle:23038002$ in the $map:02020017$ and defeat $npcName:23090006$.

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you deserve to be a member of Sky Fortress.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: $map:02020041$ Defense
quest.desc: The $map:02020010$, $map:02020034$, and $map:02020032$ all hold positions of strategic significance to $map:02020041$. Secure Sky Fortress's position by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020601$ in the $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020701$ at the $map:02020032$, $npcNamePlural:25020801$ in the $map:02020034$.
quest.descFameUI: The $map:02020010$, $map:02020034$, and $map:02020032$ all hold positions of strategic significance to $map:02020041$.

quest.name: Machine Secrets
quest.desc: The machines of the $map:02020010$ don't look remarkable compared to their counterparts throughout Kritias, but their attacks are devastating. Get $item:30001224$ from $npcNamePlural:25020601$ to uncover the secret behind their advanced weapons.
quest.descFameUI: Go to the $map:02020010$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25020601$, and get $item:30001224$.

quest.name: A Dearth of Information
quest.desc: Of all the Tairen soldiers in the $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020606$ are the strongest. As long as they are on the battlefield, Sky Fortress will keep losing scouts. It's crucial that you remove them from the fight immediately.
quest.descFameUI: As long as $npcNamePlural:25020606$ are on the battlefield in the $map:02020010$, Sky Fortress will keep losing scouts. It's crucial that you remove them from the fight immediately.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000160$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ is excited about a new research project and has reassigned you to $map:02020030$. Sky Fortress's research team is studying Tairen $itemPlural:61000160$, and it's your job to collect specimens for them. More information is always better, right?
quest.descFameUI: Capture $itemPlural:61000160$ in $map:02020030$

quest.name: Aetherine Supply Lines
quest.desc: In order to halt production in the $map:02020034$, Sky Fortress troops need to infiltrate and destroy the fusion reactor. So far, they've been unsuccessful, but $npcName:11004312$ says the research team has discovered a weakness: the $npcNamePlural:25020801$ regulating aetherine production. Destroy a few and collect $itemPlural:30001225$ to study their weaknesses.
quest.descFameUI: The Tairen have been using $npcNamePlural:25020801$ in the $map:02020034$ to regulate their aetherine production. Destroy a few and collect $itemPlural:30001225$ to study their weaknesses.

quest.name: Offensive Strike
quest.desc: There's an intense standoff between Sky Fortress and the Daemon Army at the $map:02020032$ on the outskirts of $map:02020041$. $npcName:11004312$ is determined strike first. She wants her best fighters on the front lines battling $npcNamePlural:25020701$, including you.
quest.descFameUI: There's an intense standoff between Sky Fortress and the Daemon Army at the $map:02020032$ on the outskirts of $map:02020041$. $npcName:11004312$ wants her best fighters on the front lines battling $npcNamePlural:25020701$, including you.

quest.name: Aid $map:02020013$
quest.desc: The native creatures of $map:02020013$ are shockingly vicious. The Sky Fortress research team's prevailing theory is that the local $npcNamePlural:11004548[gender:0]$ are somehow inciting that violent behavior, but they haven't figured out how to prevent it yet. Clear the area of $npcNamePlural:25020901$, so the scouts there can bring back some useful information.
quest.descFameUI: Clear the area of $npcNamePlural:25020901$, so the scouts there can bring back some useful information.

quest.name: Unique $npcName:25022105$ Features
quest.desc: The Tairen $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$ are surprisingly agile despite their heavy armor. There's a good chance the research team can reverse engineer their tech and use the knowledge to upgrade Sky Fortress weaponry. You've been assigned to destroy those mechs and collect $itemPlural:30001226$ to aid that research.
quest.descFameUI: The Tairen $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$ are surprisingly agile despite their heavy armor. Destroy the mechs and collect their parts for the Sky Fortress research team.

quest.name: Kharon Retribution
quest.desc: According to $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$, Kharon has joined forces with Tairen to kidnap exiles and attack Humanitas. The Kharon must be stopped! Head out to $map:02020010$, fight off the $npcNamePlural:25020602$, and help as many people as you can.
quest.descFameUI: Kharon forces have been kidnapping exiles to use for labor! Head out to $map:02020010$, fight off the $npcNamePlural:25020602$, and help as many people as you can.

quest.name: Laying Groundwork
quest.desc: Sky Fortress's ally, Humanitas is determined to take control of the $map:02020034$, Tairen's most valuable power production facility. But so far, they've failed. Now Sky Fortress is sending backup. Help weaken their defenses by destroying as many $npcNamePlural:25020802$ as you can.
quest.descFameUI: Weaken Tairen's defenses around the $map:02020034$ by destroying $npcNamePlural:25020802$, so Humanitas can take control of the facility.

quest.name: $item:30001227$ Research
quest.desc: Sky Fortress is in a standoff with the Daemon Army on the $map:02020032$, and they've discovered the army is drawing power from some kind of $item:30001227$. $npcName:11004312$ intends to study and use their own technology against them. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020702$ and collect their $itemPlural:30001227$, so the research team can begin studying them immediately.
quest.manual: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020702$ at the $map:02020032$ and collect their $itemPlural:30001227$
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020702$ at the $map:02020032$ and collect their $itemPlural:30001227$, so the research team can begin studying them immediately.

quest.name: Conflict Resolution
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ still hopes to ally with some of the monsters in Kritias. But her scouts aren't equipped to defend themselves if those negotiations are unsuccessful, so she's sending you instead. Go to $map:02020013$ and talk to the $npcNamePlural:25020902$ there. If it doesn't pan out, you may need to employ more aggressive negotiation tactics.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020013$ and try talking to the $npcNamePlural:25020902$ there. If it doesn't pan out, you may need to employ more aggressive negotiation tactics.

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: New Threats
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ has explained that as you get closer to the heart of Kritias, it gets more dangerous. She wants you to scout ahead and learn all you can about about $npcNamePlural:25021205$ in the $map:02020017$, $npcNamePlural:25021305[gender:0]$ in $map:02020033$, and $npcNamePlural:25021104$ in the $map:02020051$.
quest.manual: Defeat $npcName:25021205$ in the $map:02020017$ |Defeat $npcName:25021305$ in the $map:02020033$ |Defeat $npcName:25021104$ in the $map:02020051$
quest.descFameUI: Study the hunting patterns and capabilities of the monsters in the new regions.

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: Haunting in the $map:02020017$
quest.desc: $npcName:23090006$ was defeated, but new rumors about him have cropped up, and $npcName:11004312$ wants you to investigate. Go to the $map:02020017$ and see what you can dig up... or battle...
quest.manual: Go to $dungeonTitle:23038002$ in the $map:02020017$ and clear the dungeon by defeating $npcName:23090006$
quest.descFameUI: Go to $dungeonTitle:23038002$ in the $map:02020017$ and defeat $npcName:23090006$

quest.name: Defend $map:02020033$
quest.desc: Humanitas recently gained control of $map:02020033$, but almost as soon as they did, the Tairen led a vicious attack against them. Now they're trapped without food or equipment. Help fend off the attack by defeating Tairen soldiers.
quest.descFameUI: Defend Humanitas from the Tairen attack on $map:02020033$

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000167$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ has annoyed her research team enough and has decided to send them something cute and cuddly to win back their favor. Her exact description was four-legged, possibly furry, and impossibly cute. It sounds like $itemPlural:61000167$ from $map:02020008$ ought to do the trick.
quest.descFameUI: For once, you've been assigned a pleasant task in Kritias. Go get those $itemPlural:61000167$!

quest.name: Wriggling Wreckage
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25021401$ population in $map:02020014$ has gotten out of control, and they've started destroying the fruit trees there. Go thin the herd, and see if they calm down.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020014$ and thin the $npcName:25021401$ population to get them to calm down.

quest.name: $map:02020014$ in Crisis
quest.desc: Tairen soldiers have taken an interest in $map:02020014$ and plan to destroy it. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021406[gender:0]$ to protect the refuge.
quest.descFameUI: Protect $map:02020014$ from the $npcNamePlural:25021406$

quest.name: $npcName:11004312$'s Decision
quest.desc: Sky Fortress plans to help Humanitas soldiers retake the $map:02020003$. $npcName:11004312$ is convinced that foothold will yield valuable resources and information. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021501$ in the $map:02020003$ to weaken the Daemon Army's hold on the area.
quest.descFameUI: Aid your Humanitas allies by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021501$ in the $map:02020003$

quest.name: The $npcName:25021201$'s Strength
quest.desc: One of the scouts assigned to the $map:02020017$ discovered incredibly strong $npcNamePlural:25021201$ inside. $npcName:11004312$ is determined to study them and use the knowledge to strengthen Sky Fortress weapons. All you have to do is collect the parts.
quest.descFameUI: Any new tech will be crucial to winning future battles. Destroy $npcNamePlural:25021201$ in the $map:02020017$ and collect $itemPlural:30001228$ for analysis.

quest.name: Defend $map:02020033$
quest.desc: Humanitas took control of $map:02020033$, but Tairen struck back viciously. They've been cut off from all resources, and they're at risk of losing all the ground they just gained. Help drive the $npcNamePlural:25021301$ out before Humanitas suffers further losses.
quest.descFameUI: Drive as many $npcNamePlural:25021301$ as you can out of $map:02020033$ before Humanitas suffers further losses.

quest.name: $map:02020051$'s Stench
quest.desc: The $map:02020051$ earned its name, because its only visitors are Tairen soldiers seeking a place to dump their waste. Hence the vomit-inducing smell... Now Sky Fortress has made you their honorary cleanup crew! Destroy $npcNamePlural:25021101$ in $map:02020051$ before they make it worse.
quest.descFameUI: The contamination oozing up from the ground has reached critical mass. Destroy $npcNamePlural:25021101$ in $map:02020051$ before they make it worse.

quest.name: Wriggler Woes
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25021402$ are destroying every living thing in the $map:02020014$! Get 'em outta there! Defeat as many as you can and save the plants!
quest.descFameUI: If the $npcNamePlural:25021402$ are left unchecked in the $map:02020014$ much longer, there won't be anything left of the beautiful refuge.

quest.name: Secret of Organizational Power
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ is determined to find out how the Kharon forces communicate and intercept one of their messages. It might give Sky Fortress insight into how the organization functions. Go to the $map:02020003$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25021502$, and get their $itemPlural:30001229$.
quest.descFameUI: Intercepting Kharon messages is the best way to learn more about how the organization functions.

quest.name: Defend the Base
quest.desc: Humanitas took control of $map:02020033$, but they're about to lose it. The new $npcNamePlural:25021302[gender:0]$ are too strong to overcome. Help drive out as many as you can.
quest.descFameUI: The $npcNamePlural:25021302$ are threatening to overtake $map:02020033$. You must help drive them out!

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: Horror-struck Members
quest.desc: Despite your best efforts to quell them, rumors about $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ are still flying. He's been terrorizing the troops from beyond the grave. You should go to the $map:02020017$ and give that ghost a sound butt-kicking!
quest.manual: Go to $dungeonTitle:23038002$ in the $map:02020017$ and clear the dungeon by defeating $npcName:23090006$
quest.descFameUI: You have to protect Sky Fortress troops from $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$'s ghost!

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: Want to Take Back a Certain Region
quest.desc: Tairen has been using the $map:02020009$ to conduct ecological experiments for years. Now that they've handed control over to Kharon, it's ripe for the taking. Now it's your job to get rid of any enemies you find there to help Humanitas gain control of the area.
quest.descFameUI: It's your job to get rid of any enemies you find in $map:02020009$ to help Humanitas gain control of the area.

quest.name: Scouting in $map:02020018$
quest.desc: One of the new regions, $map:02020018$, has some very interesting geological and atmospheric features. But the area is still overrun with enemies, and Sky Fortress scouts can't safely gather information yet. Defeat soldiers around $map:02020018$ to make studying the area safer for them.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat soldiers around $map:02020018$ to make studying the area safer for the Sky Fortress scouts.

quest.name: No More Mechs!
quest.desc: The $map:02020009$ is still under Kharon control, but now a new kind of mech has appeared, and Sky Fortress needs to know if they're taking orders from the enemy. $npcName:11004312$ has assigned you to investigate and destroy as many $npcNamePlural:25021606$ as you can. They don't need to be any stronger than they already are.
quest.descFameUI: Investigate whether the $npcNamePlural:25021606$ in the $map:02020009$ are taking orders from Kharon and destroy as many as you can.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000169$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ is missing her friends and family, so you volunteered to go capture an adorable research subject to be her new best friend! It was good timing too, since the research team has been asking about $itemPlural:61000169$ in $map:02020037$.
quest.descFameUI: The captain looks a bit down. Maybe a cute research subject will cheer her up! One of those $itemPlural:61000169$ in $map:02020037$ maybe?

quest.name: Combat Ration Retrieval
quest.desc: $map:02020036$ truly lives up to its name. It's crawling with Daemon Army soldiers, the worst of which are the $npcNamePlural:25022001$. They stole every last piece of the mouth-watering, morale-boosting, $itemPlural:30001230$. Get in there and show them what happens when you mess with a soldier's precious cacao!
quest.descFameUI: No one steals tasty, $item:30001230$ and gets away with it! Teach those $npcNamePlural:25022001$ a lesson!

quest.name: Kharon Cutbacks
quest.desc: The Kharon fighters at the $map:02020009$ are relentless! The Sky Fortress soldiers can't hold up against the constant harassment much longer. Find the $npcNamePlural:25021601$ and take as many as you can out of the fight... permanently.
quest.descFameUI: The $npcNamePlural:25021601$ at the $map:02020009$ are relentless! Find them and take them out.

quest.name: Alternate Routes
quest.desc: The heart of Kritias is near, but Tairen has sent reinforcements to stop Sky Fortress at $map:02020037$. Scouts are looking for a detour, but with so many enemies in the area, it's gotten far too dangerous. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25022101$ and find another path into Kritias.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25022101$ in $map:02020037$ and find another path into Kritias.

quest.name: Robot Factory Infiltration
quest.desc: Sky Fortress just discovered the largest $map:02020035$. It's the perfect chance to deal a massive blow to their offense. Get on site right away and fight $npcNamePlural:25021901$ to help weaken the protections around the building.
quest.descFameUI: Tairen's mechs seem to be in infinite supply, but not for long. Attack the $map:02020035$ to disrupt production.

quest.name: A Whale of a Wriggler
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ received word of a $npcNamePlural:25021801$. As cute as those guys are, a beast this size is nothing but trouble. Go to $map:02020008$ and defeat it. Once you've done that, get $itemPlural:30001231$, so the Sky Fortress researchers can figure out how this thing grew so big in the first place.
quest.descFameUI: How does one Wriggler grow so large? Collect $itemPlural:30001231$, so the Sky Fortress researchers can figure it out.

quest.name: Unique $npcName:25021701$ Features
quest.desc: $npcName:25021701$ hides are a remarkable shade of blue, but what purpose could that possibly serve? Go to $map:02020018$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25021701$, and collect $itemPlural:30001232$ for the Sky Fortress research team.
quest.descFameUI: Find out why $npcName:25021701$ hides are such a dazzling shade of blue...

quest.name: Disabling Grenade Launchers
quest.desc: Sky Fortress fighters dispatched to $map:02020009$ have suffered heavy losses. That place is crawling with $npcNamePlural:25021602$, and their grenade launchers are no laughing matter. Go put them out of commission and give the soldiers there the upper hand.
quest.descFameUI: The $npcNamePlural:25021602$ are decimating Sky Fortress troops. Put them out of commission.

quest.name: Daemons Be Gone!
quest.desc: As long as the Daemon army occupies $map:02020036$, they'll be a permanent thorn in Sky Fortress's side. $npcName:11004312$ has decided it's time to take action. Defeat as many $npcNamePlural:25022002$ as you can so Sky Fortress can take control of the area.
quest.descFameUI: Drive the Daemon Army from $map:02020036$!

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Lumiknights
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003537$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Lumiknight order.

quest.name: Scrapping with Soldiers
quest.desc: $map:02020030$, $map:02020029$, and $map:02020031$ are under attack by Tairen's mechanical soldiers. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020002$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020102$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020202$ in $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020030$, $map:02020029$, and $map:02020031$ are under attack by Tairen's mechanical soldiers.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Lumiknights
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003537$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Lumiknight order.

quest.name: $map:02020030$ in the Middle
quest.desc: $map:02020030$ is surrounded by both Tairen and Daemon Army forces. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020101$, $npcNamePlural:25020102$, $npcNamePlural:25020103$, $npcNamePlural:25020104$, $npcNamePlural:25020105$, $npcNamePlural:25020106$, $npcNamePlural:25020107$, and $npcNamePlural:25020108$ in $map:02020030$.
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020030$ is surrounded by both Tairen and Daemon Army forces.

quest.name: Dropship Defense
quest.desc: Sky Fortress agents are trying to retrieve a downed dropship, but monsters keep blocking their path. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020004$ in $map:02020029$.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress agents are trying to retrieve a downed dropship, but monsters keep blocking their path. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020004$ in $map:02020029$.

quest.name: Cloaked in Darkness
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020104$ spread darkness everywhere they go. Go to $map:02020030$ and defeat them for their $itemPlural:30001233$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020104$ corrupts the land wherever they go. Go to $map:02020030$ and uncover the source of their dark power.

quest.name: Energy of Kritias: The Origin
quest.desc: Aetherine appears to have been used by every civilization in Kritias. Even the mages of Tairen use it in their spells. To research this miraculous substance, collect samples in $map:02020031$, $map:02020030$, and $map:02020029$.
quest.manual: Collect aetherine in $map:02020031$ |Collect aetherine in $map:02020030$ |Collect aetherine in $map:02020029$
quest.descFameUI: Collect aetherine in $map:02020031$, $map:02020030$, and $map:02020029$ for the Lumiknights' research.

quest.name: $npcName:11004163$'s Corruption

quest.descFameUI: The $npcNamePlural:25021205$ in $map:02020017$ are tremendously strong, but they turn that strength towards random attacks on your allies.

quest.name: Action Archaeology
quest.desc: The $map:02020003$ is home to ancient ruins. Unfortunately, $npcNamePlural:25021504$ are preventing Sky Fortress's researchers from excavating the place.
quest.descFameUI: The $map:02020003$ is home to ancient ruins. Unfortunately, $npcNamePlural:25021504$ are preventing Sky Fortress's researchers from excavating the place.

quest.name: The Measure of a Hat
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25021304$ claim that the source of their power is... their hats! Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021304$ in $map:02020033$ to learn the truth of their claim.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25021304$ claim that the source of their power is... their hats!

quest.name: Recovery Efforts
quest.desc: Many of the habitats in the $map:02020014$ have been destroyed by $npcNamePlural:25021407$. Defeat them so that recovery efforts can begin.
quest.descFameUI: Many of the habitats in the $map:02020014$ have been destroyed by $npcNamePlural:25021407$.

quest.name: Static
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25021204$ in the $map:02020017$ are jamming Sky Fortress's radios. Defeat them to cut through the static.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25021204$ in the $map:02020017$ are jamming Sky Fortress's radios.

quest.name: I Hate This Place
quest.desc: $map:02020051$ is a real problem, what with the deadly scrap robots and deadlier stench. Recently, it's the robots giving us trouble, attacking some of our people. They can hardly be expected to work under those conditions, so head to $map:02020051$ and defeat $npcNamePlural:25021104$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25021104$ in $map:02020051$ are going after our people. Take them out before they take us out.

quest.name: She Can't Take Much More
quest.desc: So, you've heard that terrible noise out on the Sky Fortress deck. We've been afflicted with some kind of mechanical issue in our travels between Maple World and Kritias. Repairs will take more spare parts than we have, and the engineers say the $npcNamePlural:25021105$ can supply what we need. By dismantling them, of course. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021105$ in $map:02020051$ and collect their parts.
quest.descFameUI: If we're going to get the Sky Fortress ship-shape again, get us parts from $npcNamePlural:25021105$ in $map:02020051$.

quest.name: Germ Warfare
quest.desc: $npcName:25021405$ appears to be spreading a plague around $map:02020014$. We've got too many sick people here for it to be a coincidence, so let's strike at the source.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcName:25021405$ in $map:02020014$ to end the spread of the disease.

quest.name: Energy of Kritias: $map:02020017$
quest.desc: You knew $npcName:11004316$ would ask you to get aetherine today. That's why you went ahead and did the preliminary survey. All that's left to do is go get it from $map:02020017$.
quest.descFameUI: You're way ahead of $npcName:11004316$ for once. Savor this moment, and then collect aetherine from $map:02020017$.

quest.name: Parade of Pests
quest.desc: Your allies have had trouble with the Tairen in $map:02020003$ before, and now they are under attack by $npcNamePlural:25021505$. Hurry to $map:02020003$ and eliminate the $npcNamePlural:25021505$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25021505$ in $map:02020003$ are brutalizing your allies. Take them out before they do any more damage.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Lumiknights
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003537$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Lumiknight order.

quest.name: The Darkness of $npcName:23000301$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ said his sword hungers for the destruction of darkness. It's because $npcName:11001813$'s underling $npcName:23000301$ is spreading evil still. Go to $map:02020200$ and defeat $npcName:23000301$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:23000301$ is still spreading their dark influence. They must be defeated.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Lumiknights
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003537$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Lumiknight order.

quest.name: Failure is Not an Option
quest.desc: The attack on $map:02020036$, the heart of the Daemon Army of Kritias, has begun. Resistance is expected to be great, as this could be their last stand. To weaken that resistance, go to $map:02020036$ and thin out the Daemon Army forces.
quest.manual: Defeat the Daemon Army forces in $map:02020036$
quest.descFameUI: The attack on $map:02020036$, the heart of the Daemon Army, is set to begin. Go and weaken the Daemon Army forces first.

quest.name: Breaking Into Tairen
quest.desc: Allied forces have advanced to $map:02020037$, the gateway to the Tairen mainland. All Tairen forces and Daemon Army soldiers holding $map:02020037$ must be defeated before we can continue our advance. You can aid this effort by thinning their ranks.
quest.descFameUI: Allied forces have advanced to $map:02020037$, the gateway to the Tairen mainland. All Tairen forces and Daemon Army soldiers holding $map:02020037$ must be defeated before we can continue our advance.

quest.name: Energy of Kritias: In Depth
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ doesn't seem to be in a good mood, and it's because the aetherine research isn't producing results. The researchers still need aetherine from a specific region, so get it from $map:02020009$, $map:02020008$, and $map:02020018$.
quest.manual: Collect aetherine in $map:02020009$ |Collect aetherine in $map:02020008$ |Collect aetherine in $map:02020018$
quest.descFameUI: The researchers still need aetherine from a specific region, so get it from $map:02020009$, $map:02020008$, and $map:02020018$.

quest.name: $item:30001242$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ said that a Tairen soldier called $npcName:25022102$ in $map:02020037$ has a notebook full of military secrets. Defeat them and bring back the notebook.
quest.descFameUI: A Tairen soldier called $npcName:25022102$ in $map:02020037$ has a notebook full of military secrets. Defeat them and bring back the notebook.

quest.name: Occupied $map:02020035$
quest.desc: $map:02020035$ has been occupied by the Daemon Army. They produce mechanical soldiers there, and so it must be destroyed. As a first step towards that goal, you must take out $npcName:25021902$.
quest.descFameUI: The Daemon Army's mechanical soldiers are produced in $map:02020035$. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021902$ as the first step towards destroying the factory.

quest.name: Running Rampant
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ asked you about the $npcName:25021906$, said to be the strongest of all the mechanical warriors. He wants you to take it on, expecting that you'll be the one to finally beat it. Head to $map:02020035$ if you want to prove him right.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:25021906$ in $map:02020035$ is the strongest mechanical soldiers we've encountered thus far. Let's see how you deal with it.

quest.name: Allergic to Poison
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ is looking pretty rough. He says it's the pollen from $npcNamePlural:11004548$'s spreading all the way to $map:02020008$. Of course, the bigger problem are the $npcNamePlural:25021802$ that've gone wild because of the pollen. Go to $map:02020008$ and defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021802$ before things get worse.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcName:25021802$ to end the rampage started by $npcName:11004548$'s pollen.

quest.name: Programming Error
quest.desc: The mechanical soldiers have been reprogrammed by $npcName:11004430$ to serve the Daemon Army. But one of them, $npcName:25021702$ in $map:02020018$, broke its coding and is attacking everything. Go to $map:02020018$, defeat $npcName:25021702$, and get its memory.
quest.manual: Defeat $npcName:25021702$ in $map:02020018$ and collect the memory chip
quest.descFameUI: A mechanical soldier called $npcName:25021702$ in $map:02020018$ went out of control due to a coding error. Bring back its memory chip to study.

quest.name: Energy of Kritias: $map:02020008$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ is finally seeing progress from the aetherine research team. Their most recent request is aetherine from $map:02020008$... and if you're lucky, this might be the last one!
quest.descFameUI: Collect aetherine from $map:02020008$ to help speed along the aetherine research.

quest.name: The Scourge of Kharon
quest.desc: The natural features of Kritias can be found in $map:02020009$, but $npcName:25021603$ of Kharon is tearing it all apart. $npcName:11004316$ has taken great offense at this, so go to $map:02020009$ and defeat $npcName:25021603$.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcName:25021603$ to preserve the natural state of $map:02020009$.

quest.name: Energy of Kritias: $map:02020018$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ gave you the good news that the aetherine research is coming to an end. You just need one more sample, from $map:02020018$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020018$ and collect the final aetherine.

quest.name: Nothing Tame About 'Em
quest.desc: Tamers appeared in Kritias, looking for . When you asked why they are here, $npcName:11004316$ said it's because of the Daemon Army Guard Dogs in $map:02020036$. $npcName:25022003$ has the Guard Dogs under their thumb... and that will never do. Go to $map:02020036$ and defeat them.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcName:25022003$ to free the Guard Dogs in $map:02020036$ and keep them from attacking your allies.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Green Hoods
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003536$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Green Hoods.

quest.name: Interfering with the Interference
quest.desc: Monsters are interfering with lapenshard research. Clear them out so the researchers can do their work! Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020003$ at the $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020103$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020202$ in $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: The Green Hoods are running into trouble with their lapenshard research. Suppress those bothering them so they can continue their work.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Green Hoods
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003536$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Green Hoods.

quest.name: For Science in Ranmelle!
quest.desc: The Green Hoods want to study aetherine more closely, but the Tairen forces occupying $map:02020031$ are getting in the way. Defeat monsters in $map:02020031$ to fix the problem.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat the mechanical soldiers in $map:02020031$ interfering with the Green Hoods' aetherine research.

quest.name: Aetherine Research Interference
quest.desc: The Green Hoods have found a connection between mana and aetherine and want to study it more. But the local monsters keep getting in the way! Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020004$ at the $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020104$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020204$ in $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat the creatures interfering with the Green Hood research at the $map:02020029$, $map:02020030$, and $map:02020031$.

quest.name: Aetherine I Pretty?
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020003$ from the $map:02020029$ have been breaking into the aetherine supplies in $map:02020031$! Sure, they're just doing what they've always done, but the Green Hoods worked hard for their aetherine hoard! Head to the $map:02020029$ and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020003$!
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020003$ from the $map:02020029$ have been breaking into the Green Hoods' aetherine supplies! They must be stopped!

quest.name: Whiplash
quest.desc: The $map:52100110$ in $map:02020031$ is currently occupied by the Daemon Army. The funny thing is that the $npcNamePlural:25020203$ joined the Daemon Army without even putting up a fight. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020203$ to get to the bottom of what's going on. You'll need all the data you can get if you hope to stand up to the Daemon Army,
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020031$ is currently occupied by the Daemon Army. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020203$ to get to the bottom of why they switched sides so quickly.

quest.name: The Fight for Aetherine
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020102$ have been stealing the $itemPlural:30001244$ excavated from $map:02020030$ to use as batteries! Defeat them and get the crystals back!
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020102$ have been stealing $itemPlural:30001244$ to use as batteries! Defeat them and get the crystals back!

quest.name: $map:02020031$ Rumor: Communicating with Local Fauna
quest.desc: It appears that Poings can communicate with people, at least a little. $npcName:11004315$ wants you to try communicating with a Poing in $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020031$ and try communicating with a Poing.

quest.name: Retaking the Floating Island
quest.desc: Retaking the floating island is an important first step to taking back $map:02020030$. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020106$ to help Humanitas retake the island!
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020106$ to help Humanitas retake $map:02020030$.

quest.name: $map:02020030$ Rumor: Strange Melody
quest.desc: Mysterious devices throughout Kritias play a strange melody on occasion. Investigate the device in $map:02020030$ and see what you can discover about the melody.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020030$ and operate the mysterious device to hear its melody and unearth its secret.

quest.name: The Daemon Army's Aetherine
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25020105$ in $map:02020030$ are using aetherine to fuel their magic! Gather $itemPlural:30001245$ from them so that $npcName:11004315$ can study them.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020105$ have been applying aetherine crystals to magic. Get to the bottom of it!

quest.name: Clearing Out Ranmelle
quest.desc: Researchers in $map:02020031$ mine were attacked by $npcNamePlural:25020205$. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020205$ so that the researchers can do their work in peace.
quest.descFameUI: Take care of the $npcNamePlural:25020205$ in $map:02020031$ interfering with aetherine research.

quest.name: $map:02020029$ Rumor: Sky Garden
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ says that a mysterious platform with a flower on it appeared in the $map:02020029$. She wants you to go investigate.
quest.manual: Examine the platform in the sky
quest.descFameUI: Go to the $map:02020029$ to check the platform in the air and see if the rumors are true.

quest.name: Beware of Poison!
quest.desc: Research in the $map:02020029$ has been slowed by the $npcNamePlural:25020005$ making the scientists there sick. Clear them out, for the sake of science!
quest.descFameUI: Research in the $map:02020029$ has been slowed by the $npcNamePlural:25020005$ making the scientists there sick. Clear them out, for the sake of science!

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Green Hoods
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003536$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Green Hoods.

quest.name: Colorful Creatures
quest.desc: Some of the more colorful creatures in Kritias are more aggressive than the rest, and they're proving to be a threat to the researchers' safety. The $npcNamePlural:25020504$ in $map:02020001$, $npcNamePlural:25020403$ in $map:02020004$, and $npcNamePlural:25020302$ at the $map:02020006$ are proving to be the biggest threats. Clear them out!
quest.descFameUI: Some of the more colorful creatures in Kritias are more aggressive than the rest, and they're proving to be a threat to the researchers' safety. They must be cleared out!

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Green Hoods
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003536$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Green Hoods.

quest.name: Bonneville Under Fire
quest.desc: A research camp was set up in $map:02020004$ to study a large device found there, but the enemies in the area keep attacking! Clear them out!
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020004$ is a key location that connects to $map:02020041$ is constantly under attack. Clear out enemies to give the researchers there a break.

quest.name: New Research Facility
quest.desc: A new energy signature has been found in $map:02020001$, but before a research facility can be constructed, the enemies there must be cleared out.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat the hostiles interfering with the construction of the research facility in $map:02020001$.

quest.name: People Are Starving!
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25020301$ in $map:02020006$ are stealing food supplies! You have to do something about this before everyone starves!
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020301$ are stealing food supplies! You have to do something about this before everyone starves!

quest.name: $map:02020004$ Rumor: Blossoms
quest.desc: A mysterious device in $map:02020004$ makes flowers bloom when activated. $npcName:11004315$ wants to 'investigate' them. Head to $map:02020004$ and see what you can find out.
quest.descFameUI: Operate the mysterious device discovered in $map:02020004$ to unearth its secrets.

quest.name: Retrieving Important Data
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020501$ in $map:02020001$ attacked our scouts and stole their reports! Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020501$ to retrieve the $itemPlural:30001246$!
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020501$ attacked our scouts and stole their reports! Head to $map:02020001$ and get back those $itemPlural:30001246$!

quest.name: Stolen Data
quest.desc: A scout was attacked by $npcNamePlural:25020401$ in $map:02020004$ and lost a valuable report in the confusion. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020401$ to find the $itemPlural:30001247$.
quest.descFameUI: A scout was attacked while exploring $map:02020004$ and lost a valuable report. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020401$ to find the $itemPlural:30001247$.

quest.name: Aetherine Thieves
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25020403$ are mining aetherine in $map:02020004$, leaving less for $npcName:11004315$'s experiments! Clear them out, for $npcName:11004315$'s sake!
quest.descFameUI: Clear out $npcNamePlural:25020403$ to help with the aetherine stockpiles.

quest.name: Aetherine Munchers
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25020302$ in $map:02020006$ are eating the Green Hoods' aetherine stockpiles. Clear them out and see if you can retrieve any of the aetherine.
quest.descFameUI: Clear out $npcNamePlural:25020302$ so that they stop eating up all the aetherine.

quest.name: $map:02020001$ Rumor: Sky Garden
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ wants you to investigate $map:02020001$ to find out what's going on with the platforms that appear there.
quest.descFameUI: Go to the $map:02020001$ to check the platform in the air and see if the rumors are true.

quest.name: Mischievous Little Creatures
quest.desc: The curious, mischievous $npcNamePlural:25020504$ at $map:02020001$ are interfering with research. Go teach them a lesson!
quest.descFameUI: The curious, mischievous $npcNamePlural:25020504$ are interfering with research. They need to be taught a lesson.

quest.name: Protect the Lab!
quest.desc: Research at $map:02020001$ is being delayed by $npcName:25020507$ attacks! Put a stop to the mayhem!
quest.descFameUI: Research at $map:02020001$ is being delayed by $npcName:25020507$ attacks! Put a stop to the mayhem!

quest.name: Dealing with Thieves
quest.desc: Some supplies being stored at $map:02020006$ have been getting stolen by $npcNamePlural:25020303$. Head over there and deal with the problem.
quest.descFameUI: Clear out the $npcNamePlural:25020303$ who are stealing Sky Fortress supplies.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Green Hoods
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003536$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Green Hoods.

quest.name: Exploration Forever!
quest.desc: The exploration of new lands is exciting but also dangerous. Clear out the $npcNamePlural:25020701$ at the $map:02020032$, $npcNamePlural:25020805$ at the $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25020905$ on $map:02020013$ to help make things a little safer.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat the monsters interfering with exploration at the $map:02020032$, $map:02020034$, and $map:02020013$.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Green Hoods
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003536$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Green Hoods.

quest.name: Serious Supply Route
quest.desc: Enemies have endangered supply routes along $map:02020013$. Defeat the monsters there.
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020013$ is a key supply route between Humanitas and Sky Fortress. Clear the area of monsters.

quest.name: 废物填埋场的季提卡
quest.desc:
在$map:02020051$里的$npcName:23001006$是一种能引发地震的庞大怪物。它不断破坏绿披风的设施，对周围地区造成污染，使考察陷入了危险的困境中。
而且$npcName:23001006$还能钻入地底藏起来，想捕捉它们也不容易。
请前往$map:02020051$消灭$npcName:23001006$，为绿披风消除这个心头大患。
quest.descFameUI: 听说$npcName:23001006$能在$map:02020051$引发地震，让那里不少队员都受了伤。得赶紧制伏那个家伙，让它别再生事。

quest.name: The Reactor Blueprint
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ has a lead on some Tairen technology. Go to $map:02020010$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25020604$, and get $itemPlural:30001249$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:11004315$ has a lead on some Tairen technology.

quest.name: Defend Safehold
quest.desc: The $map:02020032$ is under heavy attack from $npcNamePlural:25020704$.
quest.descFameUI: The $map:02020032$ is under heavy attack from $npcNamePlural:25020704$.

quest.name: 地震之源
quest.desc:
克里蒂亚斯各地经常发生大大小小的地震，不少考察队员都在地震中受了伤，考察装备也遭到了损坏。
经调查发现，是$map:02020051$的$npcName:23001006$引发了地震。$npcName:23001006$的体型非常强大，考察队员根本就不是它的对手。
而且$npcName:23001006$的脾性也非常凶猛易怒，独自迎战季提卡未免太过鲁莽，不妨与其他冒险家一起合作，协力打败$npcName:23001006$吧。
quest.descFameUI: 据说是$npcName:23001006$在$map:02020051$引发了地震，使得队员一直受伤。趁目前损失还不算严重，赶紧去制伏那个家伙吧。

quest.name: $map:02020010$ Rumor: Rings
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ is looking into rumors from Kritias. The $map:02020010$ also has a device that summons shiny rings in the sky. You should check it out.
quest.descFameUI: Go to the $map:02020010$ and use the device to summon a shiny ring.

quest.name: $map:02020013$ Rumor: Strange Melody
quest.desc: Mysterious devices throughout Kritias play a strange melody on occasion. Investigate the device in $map:02020013$ and see what you can discover about the melody.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020013$ and operate the mysterious device to hear its melody and unearth its secret.

quest.name: Aetherine Setbacks
quest.desc: Sky Fortress researchers have discovered an energy signal in the ruins of $map:02020016$. Unfortunately, the $npcNamePlural:25021004$ won't let them get close...
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress researchers have discovered an energy signal in the ruins of $map:02020016$.

quest.name: Pure Aetherine
quest.desc: Robot soldiers equipped with $itemPlural:30001250$ were sighted in the $map:02020034$. Defeat these $npcNamePlural:25020804$ and take their crystals.
quest.descFameUI: Robot soldiers equipped with $itemPlural:30001250$ were sighted in the $map:02020034$. Confiscate their crystals.

quest.name: Very Precious Bodily Fluids
quest.desc: It's been discovered that $npcNamePlural:25020904$' $item:30001251$ are a catalyst used in aetherine energy extraction. Go to $map:02020013$ and get those stinky fluids.
quest.descFameUI: It's been discovered that $npcNamePlural:25020904$' $item:30001251$ are a catalyst used in aetherine energy extraction.

quest.name: Revenge of the Crew
quest.desc: Sky Fortress crew were ambushed at the $map:02020034$ by $npcNamePlural:25020806$, taking heavy injuries. Avenge them.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress crew were ambushed at the $map:02020034$ by $npcNamePlural:25020806$, taking heavy injuries.

quest.name: Four-Footed Fury
quest.desc: Your allies were attacked by $npcNamePlural:25020605$ in the $map:02020010$. Defeat these enemies so your allies can resume their assault.
quest.descFameUI: Your allies were attacked by $npcNamePlural:25020605$ in the $map:02020010$.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Green Hoods
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003536$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Green Hoods.

quest.name: Aetherine Impeded
quest.desc: The Green Hoods' research facilities in Kritias are under attack. Come to their defense by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021503$ in the $map:02020003$, $npcNamePlural:25021303$ in $map:02020033$, and $npcNamePlural:25021203$ in the $map:02020017$.
quest.descFameUI: The Green Hoods' research facilities in Kritias are under attack.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Green Hoods
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003536$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Green Hoods.

quest.name: 暴走的季提卡
quest.desc:
$npcName:23001006$所引发的地震，甚至已经对天空堡垒造成了破坏，我们必须行动起来了。
请前往$map:02020051$消灭$npcName:23001006$吧。
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:23001006$在$map:02020051$引发了地震，使那里不少队员都受了伤。得赶紧制伏那个家伙，让它别再生事。

quest.name: Perkau Plains Expedition
quest.desc: The magic and technology of Kritias is most prominent in $map:02020003$. This region offers untold possibilities for exploration, but the local monsters will complicate those efforts. Thin the monsters out to help the expedition proceed.
quest.descFameUI: Take out the monsters interfering with the expedition $map:02020003$.

quest.name: Why Would You Eat That?!
quest.desc: A new medicine is being developed to treat those affected by $npcName:23001006$'s poison. We need samples of the poison to work with, but the $npcNamePlural:25021102$ eat it for... some reason. If we're going to get these samples, the $npcNamePlural:25021102$ have to go.
quest.descFameUI: There's a plan to gather samples of $npcName:23001006$'s poison and create an antidote, but $npcNamePlural:25021102$ are gobbling it up. Find and stop them in $map:02020051$ so the research can progress.

quest.name: 季提卡的战斗数据
quest.desc:
绿披风正在研究$npcName:23001006$的战斗数据，试图了解它们为什么会在克里蒂亚斯生活，和它们在克里蒂亚斯的活动习惯。
为了收集战斗数据，请前往$map:02020051$，与$npcName:23001006$展开战斗吧。
quest.descFameUI: 必须收集$npcName:23001006$的战斗数据，才能了解这家伙的行为模式。

quest.name: Preservation Efforts
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25021202$ break everything they touch, placing the priceless documents stored within the $map:02020017$ in grave danger. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021202$ before they destroy an irreplaceable body of knowledge about Kritias's history.
quest.descFameUI: Records of ancient Kritias are stored in the $map:02020017$. They are priceless sources of knowledge, so please protect them by stopping the $npcNamePlural:25021202$.

quest.name: Precious Bodily Fluids
quest.desc: We've discovered that $npcName:25021403$'s $item:30001252$ is an enzyme that can neutralize $npcName:23001006$'s poison. More enzyme samples are necessary to complete development of a cure. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021403$ and collect $itemPlural:30001252$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:25021403$ bodily fluids contain an enzyme that can neutralize $npcName:23001006$'s poison. Do what you have to do to get $item:30001252$.

quest.name: Perkau Melody
quest.desc: The odd device in $map:02020003$ plays a unique melody. Matching the melody from the device is said to open a special treasure chest. Discover the melody, and find the treasure.
quest.manual: Play the melody and open the golden chest
quest.descFameUI: The expedition members discovered the source of the unfamiliar melody in $map:02020003$. Go there and learn the melody.

quest.name: Stripped for Parts
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25021503$ in $map:02020003$ have been stripping our equipment for parts. Seems Maple World tech has some value out here. Teach those $npcNamePlural:25021503$ that they need to keep their hands to themselves.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25021503$ in $map:02020003$ are stealing Sky Fortress parts. Rough them up so they think twice before stealing again.

quest.name: The Last Stand of Mannstad
quest.desc: $npcName:25021303$ is destroying the stronghold in $map:02020033$. If we want to maintain our hold on the area, you'll need to defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021303$.
quest.descFameUI: The second Humanitas base, $map:02020033$, is under attack by $npcNamePlural:25021303$. Push them back and defend the fortress.

quest.name: Log Recovery
quest.desc: Important research is at risk because $npcNamePlural:25021203$ have stolen the $itemPlural:30001253$. Such a huge setback cannot be allowed. Find them, and bring back the $itemPlural:30001253$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25021203$ have stolen our $itemPlural:30001253$. Find them, catch them, and bring back those logs.

quest.name: Assault on Mannstad Fortress
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25021307$ have invaded $map:02020033$. Drive them out and restore control of $map:02020033$.
quest.descFameUI: The $npcNamePlural:25021307$ of Tairen are attacking the Humanitas base, $map:02020033$.

quest.name: Probe-tection
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25021103$ in $map:02020051$ are using surface-to-air missiles to attack the probe. Take them down before they take the probe down.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25021103$ have been trying to shoot down our probe in $map:02020051$. Better put a stop to that.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Green Hoods
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003536$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Green Hoods.

quest.name: 升级攻击模式
quest.desc:
$npcName:23001006$竟然出现了全新的攻击模式，它似乎能自我学习，升级攻击模式。$npcName:23001006$的技术复杂程度远远超出了我们的想象。
为了收集更多的数据，请前往$map:02020051$击败$npcName:23001006$吧。
quest.descFameUI: 必须掌握$npcName:23001006$的最新攻击模式，才能预测它的攻击方式。需要与$npcName:23001006$进行，收集最新的战斗数据。

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Green Hoods
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003536$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Green Hoods.

quest.name: Security Clearance
quest.desc: $map:02020035$ has been occupied by the Daemon Army, and they intend on using it to produce more mechanical warriors for their army. Assault the factory and clear out the robots!
quest.manual: Clear out the security force in $map:02020035$
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020035$ has been occupied by the Daemon Army, and they're producing more mechanical warriors. Weaken the security forces to prepare for an assault on the factory.

quest.name: Hunters of Leshy Forest
quest.desc: $map:02020008$ is filled with plants that take in aetherine. It's an important region for research, but the monsters there are very aggressive towards intruders. Aid the researchers by thinning out the predator population.
quest.manual: Clear out the hostile monsters in $map:02020008$
quest.descFameUI: Clear out the hostile monsters in $map:02020008$ to protect the Green Hoods aetherine operations.

quest.name: Tairen's Military Secrets
quest.desc: The Shadow Walkers found $npcName:25021804$ delivering $item:30001254$, which could expose the Alliance's weaknesses. Defeat $npcName:25021804$ and return with the $item:30001254$.
quest.descFameUI: The Tairen Kingdom is delivering a secret military document via $npcName:25021804$. Take them down and recover the $item:30001254$.

quest.name: 分析季提卡的AI模式
quest.desc:
想要进一步分析$npcName:23001006$的AI模式，我们得找到能破解其系统的薄弱环节。 要做到这点，得先与$npcName:23001006$较量一场。
请前往$map:02020051$与$npcName:23001006$战斗吧。
quest.descFameUI: 研究组在分析和破解$npcName:23001006$的AI模式后，找出了它的弱点。为了进一步深入研究，需要收集$npcName:23001006$的战斗数据。

quest.name: Courting Danger
quest.desc: Your allies have advanced to $map:02020037$, the gateway to the heart of Kritias. Because of the strategic value of this area, the enemy has stationed their elite forces there. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25022103$ to clear the way for the allied forces to establish a foothold in the region.
quest.descFameUI: The Alliance has reached $map:02020037$, the gateway to Tairen's territory. Deal with the $npcNamePlural:25022103$ who defend it to secure entry.

quest.name: 季提卡的外骨骼
quest.desc:
分析出$npcName:23001006$外部骨骼的金属特质，就能用天空堡垒发出的振动波造成裂缝。
但要弄到外骨骼的金属并不容易，需要先将它击败，才能收集到。
请前往$map:02020051$与$npcName:23001006$展开战斗吧。
quest.descFameUI: 若是能分析$npcName:23001006$外骨骼分子结构的声波，说不定就能成功制造裂缝。 必须先战胜它，才能收集有关其外骨骼的信息。

quest.name: Chips Ahoy
quest.desc: The allied forces need data to analyze the tactical programming of the robots manufactured in the $map:02020035$. A thorough dumping of the $npcName:25021903$ memory chips could yield the key to turning these foes into allies. It's up to you to send the $npcNamePlural:25021903$ to the junk heap and collect their $itemPlural:30001255$.
quest.descFameUI: A thorough analysis of the memory chips from the robots in the $map:02020035$, may reveal vulnerabilities that could be used to turn them into allies. You need to take out $npcNamePlural:25021903$ and collect their memory chips.

quest.name: A is for Antidote
quest.desc: The soldiers of the alliance have run into an unforeseen setback, becoming poisoned by the powder scattered about by the wings of the $npcNamePlural:25021803$ in $map:02020008$. Exterminate $npcNamePlural:25021803$ to help the exploration of the region continue without further incident.
quest.descFameUI: The explorers have been taken ill, suffering the effects of the poison powder spread by the flapping of the $npcNamePlural:25021803$' wings. Take them out to make the area safe for traversal again.

quest.name: Death by Daemon
quest.desc: The Daemon Army forces in Kritias are growing by the day, the few have been as violent and destructive as the $npcNamePlural:25022005$. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25022005$ in $map:02020036$ to prevent them from causing any further damage.
quest.descFameUI: The team sent to investigate the dark energy at $map:02020036$ have suffered great losses at the hands of the $npcNamePlural:25022005$. Take them out so the investigation can resume.

quest.name: From Sample to Complex
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25021604$ broke in and stole the $item:30001256$ for $npcName:23001006$'s poison that was discovered at the $map:02020009$. Find $npcNamePlural:25021604$ at the $map:02020009$, defeat them, and take back the $item:30001256$.
quest.descFameUI: The $npcName:25021604$ launched a surprise raid on the research team and seized the antidote sample made to counteract $npcName:23001006$ contaminant. Defeat them and retrieve the sample.

quest.name: The Aetherine Factor
quest.desc: An expedition was sent to $map:02020018$ to carry out aetherine research, but attacks from $npcNamePlural:25021703$ have threatened the viability of the entire expedition. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021703$ in $map:02020018$ and make the area safe for research.
quest.descFameUI: The expedition members researching aetherine crystals in $map:02020018$ were taken off-guard by sudden attacks by $npcNamePlural:25021703$. Deal with these foes to make the area safe for research.

quest.name: Every Dog Has its Day
quest.desc: Scouting is necessary in preparation for the attack on $map:02020036$, but frequent attacks by $npcNamePlural:25022004$ have made reconaissance difficult. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25022004$ so that the scouts can complete their mission safely.
quest.descFameUI: An assault against the occupied territories of the Daemon Army is being planned, but the gathering of intelligence will prove vital. Cull the $npcNamePlural:25022004$ patrolling the area to ensure the scouts' safety.

quest.name: $map:02020030$ in Crisis
quest.desc: Humanitas's base of $map:02020030$ is under threat from constant monster attack. Come to their aid by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020004$ in $map:02020029$ and $npcNamePlural:25020104$ in $map:02020030$.
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020030$ is surrounded by monsters. Come to Humanitas's aid.

quest.name: Securing the Supply Line
quest.desc: $map:02020004$ and $map:02020006$ sit on key supply lines for $map:02020041$, but they're being overwhelmed by monsters. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020305$ in $map:02020006$ and $npcNamePlural:25020403$ in $map:02020004$.
quest.descFameUI: The monsters in $map:02020004$ and $map:02020006$ are attacking Sky Fortress's supply lines.

quest.name: Holding the Line
quest.desc: The $map:02020032$ is under constant attack from the Daemon Army. If $map:02020041$ is ever to be a city in its own right, then these enemies must be turned back. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020701$, $npcNamePlural:25020702$, $npcNamePlural:25020703$, $npcNamePlural:25020704$, $npcNamePlural:25020705$, $npcNamePlural:25020706$, and $npcNamePlural:25020707$ in $map:02020032$.
quest.descFameUI: The outpost must be secured. Defeat monsters in $map:02020032$.

quest.name: Nature in Technology
quest.desc: In spite of its technological advancement, natural scenery can be found throughout Kritias. Unfortunately, monsters are threatening that beauty in $map:02020014$.
quest.descFameUI: Technology and nature are in balance in Kritias. The beauty of this place must be protected.

quest.name: Monstrous Interference
quest.desc: The further you venture into Kritias, the more fierce the monster resistance becomes. Clear a path for Sky Fortress's scouts.
quest.descFameUI: Monsters are interfering with Sky Fortress's exploration of Kritias.

quest.name: Jamming the Jammers
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020102$ are emitting a signal that interferes with Sky Fortress's radio systems. Go to $map:02020030$ and defeat them.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020102$ are jamming the radio signals of scouts in $map:02020030$.

quest.name: Attack on $map:02020004$
quest.desc: The nearest town to $map:02020041$, $map:02020004$, is occupied by Tairen. Head there and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020405$.
quest.descFameUI: The nearest town to $map:02020041$, $map:02020004$, is occupied by Tairen. Head there and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020405$.

quest.name: Endangered Research
quest.desc: Ecological research in $map:02020034$ and $map:02020013$ has come to a stop due to monster attacks. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020804$ in $map:02020034$ and $npcNamePlural:25020904$ in $map:02020013$.
quest.descFameUI: Ecological research in $map:02020034$ and $map:02020013$ has come to a stop due to monster attacks.

quest.name: Tairen Raid
quest.desc: Sky Fortress is preparing an offensive against Tairen forces in $map:02020017$ and $map:02020033$. Your part in this attack is to defeat $npcNamePlural:25021205$ in $map:02020017$ and $npcNamePlural:25021305$ in $map:02020033$.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress is planning a raid on $map:02020017$ and $map:02020033$.

quest.name: Act of Stewardship
quest.desc: The monsters in $map:02020035$ and $map:02020037$ are suddenly attacking Sky Fortress agents. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021904$ and $npcNamePlural:25022104$.
quest.descFameUI: The monsters in $map:02020035$ and $map:02020037$ are suddenly attacking Sky Fortress agents.

quest.name: Aetherine Endangered
quest.desc: Sky Fortress's access to aetherine is endangered by the $npcNamePlural:25020102$ near $map:02020030$. If this goes on, research into aetherine will come grinding to a halt.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's access to aetherine is endangered by the $npcNamePlural:25020102$ near $map:02020030$. If this goes on, research into aetherine will come grinding to a halt.

quest.name: The Research Must Go On
quest.desc: Monsters are interfering with research in $map:02020001$ and $map:02020004$ is growing as the days go by. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020505$ in $map:02020001$ and $npcNamePlural:25020402$ in $map:02020004$.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat the monsters interfering with aetherine research in $map:02020001$ and $map:02020004$.

quest.name: Scratching the Ruin Surface
quest.desc: Excavation of $map:02020016$ has been delayed by the many robots and Kharon forces in the area. Because the ruins seem to have a lot of aetherine in them, someone needs to get rid of the monsters to make room for the excavation team.
quest.descFameUI: Excavation in $map:02020016$ hasn't started because of monster interference. Remove this interference.

quest.name: Records of Ancient Kritias
quest.desc: $map:02020017$ is a valuable repository of writings on ancient Kritias. Enemy forces are destroying these writings and must be stopped.
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020017$ is a valuable repository of writings on ancient Kritias. Enemy forces are destroying these writings and must be stopped.

quest.name: Research Interference
quest.desc: Research in $map:02020009$ and $map:02020018$ is endangered by frequent monster attacks. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021605$ in $map:02020009$ and $npcNamePlural:25021704$ in $map:02020018$.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021605$ in $map:02020009$ and $npcNamePlural:25021704$ in $map:02020018$ to keep them from attacking researchers.

quest.name: [Special] Gigantica Rampage
quest.desc:
$npcName:23001006$ is on a rampage in $map:02020051$. It must be defeated before it does more damage.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Gigantica missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">$npcName:23001006$ Mission</font> $npcName:23001006$ is on a rampage in $map:02020051$. It must be defeated before it does more damage.

quest.name: [Special] Gigantica Contained
quest.desc:
Sky Fortress's medics can't keep up with the soldiers injured fighting $npcName:23001006$ in $map:02020051$. Defeat the monster so that the medics can catch up.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Gigantica missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">$npcName:23001006$ Mission</font> Medics can't keep up with those ijured fighting $npcName:23001006$ in $map:02020051$. Defeat the mechanoid monster!

quest.name: [Special] Gigantica's Tactics
quest.desc:
$npcName:23001006$ in $map:02020051$ is unlike any enemy Sky Fortress has ever encountered. Collect combat data on this strange monster by fighting it.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Gigantica missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">$npcName:23001006$ Mission</font> Study $npcName:23001006$'s tactics and strategies.

quest.name: [Special] Daemon Army Invasion 1
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001813$'s fingerprints are all over the disasters taking place in Kritias. Uncover his plot.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] First Legion missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear a legion battle in $map:02020061$ or $map:02020065$
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">First Legion Mission</font> $npcName:11001813$'s fingerprints are all over the disasters taking place in Kritias. Uncover his plot.

quest.name: [Special] Spreading Darkness 1
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001813$ taints everything he touches. Track down his corruption to its source.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] First Legion missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear a legion battle in $map:02020061$ or $map:02020065$
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">First Legion Mission</font> $npcName:11001813$ taints everything he touches. Track down his corruption to its source.

quest.name: [Special] Daemon Army Counterattack 1
quest.desc: The Daemon Army has practically occupied Kidel. If Sky Fortress is too defeat them, then they'll need more intelligence on the enemy forces. (Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] First Legion missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear a legion battle in $map:02020061$ or $map:02020065$
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">First Legion Mission</font> Daemon forces have occupied much of Kidel. If the Alliance is to defeat them, they'll need more intelligence on the enemy.

quest.name: [Special] Daemon Army Invasion 2
quest.desc:
The Daemon Army is on the move again, and this time their eyes are set on all of Kritias. Cut them off before they threaten Sky Fortress and its allies.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Second Legion missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear a legion battle in $map:02020062$ or $map:02020063$
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">Second Legion Mission</font> Daemon forces are on the move. Cut them off before they threaten Sky Fortress and its allies.

quest.name: [Special] Spreading Darkness 2
quest.desc:
Darkness surges through the land as $npcName:11001813$'s Daemon Army marches. This cannot be allowed!
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Second Legion missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear a legion battle in $map:02020062$ or $map:02020063$
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">Second Legion Mission</font> Darkness surges through the land as $npcName:11001813$'s Daemon Army marches. This cannot be allowed!

quest.name: [Special] Daemon Army Counterattack 2
quest.desc: After all this time, you still know almost nothing about $npcName:11001813$. The Green Hoods have decided to study him by investigating his Daemon Army. (Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Second Legion missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear a legion battle in $map:02020062$ or $map:02020063$
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">Second Legion Mission</font> Darkness surges through the land as $npcName:11001813$'s Daemon Army marches. This cannot be allowed!

quest.name: No Other Option
quest.desc: $npcName:11004430$ keeps turning monsters to the side of evil. Curtail his vile efforts by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020001$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020205$ in $map:02020031$, and $npcNamePlural:25020106$ in $map:02020030$.
quest.descFameUI: Evil is spreading through the land. Defeat the monsters that are most affected.

quest.name: Combat Aid
quest.desc: There are too many monsters for Sky Fortress's soldiers to handle. Help out by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020002$ in $map:02020029$ and $npcNamePlural:25020206$ in $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: The enemy forces seem to have no end. It's only a matter of time before Sky Fortress is overwhelmed.

quest.name: Imminent Threat
quest.desc: Humanitas is in dire need of reinforcements. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020306$ in $map:02020006$, $npcNamePlural:25020406$ in $map:02020004$, and $npcNamePlural:25020506$ in $map:02020001$.
quest.descFameUI: Humanitas is being overwhelmed by waves of enemies. Help them fight back.

quest.name: For Humanitas
quest.desc: Humanitas is having a hard time holding back enemy attacks from $map:02020004$ and $map:02020001$. Help Humanitas by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020403$ in $map:02020004$ and $npcNamePlural:25020507$ in $map:02020001$.
quest.descFameUI: Help Humanitas defend from attacks in multiple directions.

quest.name: Strange Swords
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ is interested in the fencing techniques of Kritias. Study them by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020602$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020802$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021004$ in $map:02020016$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:11004312$ wants to understand the fencing of Kritias. Experience this fencing for yourself.

quest.name: Brutal Bullets
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ prefers swordplay, but still wants to learn about the gunplay of Kritias. Study $npcNamePlural:25020604$ in $map:02020010$ and $npcNamePlural:25021005$ in $map:02020016$.
quest.descFameUI: Study how the enemy uses their guns to better prepare the crew of Sky Fortress for field engagements.

quest.name: Rookies in Danger
quest.desc: Due to a mix-up, rookie soldiers were accidentally sent into areas with heavy fighting. Protect them by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021106$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021202$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021502$ in $map:02020003$.
quest.descFameUI: Protect some new recruits who have waded a little too far into the deep end.

quest.name: Heavy Foes
quest.desc: Heavily armored enemies have been spotted by Sky Fortress's advance scouts. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021205$ in $map:02020017$ and $npcNamePlural:25021406$ in $map:02020014$.
quest.descFameUI: Heavily armored enemies have been spotted. Defeat these enemies before they interfere with research and scouting operations.

quest.name: Tairen Interference
quest.desc: The road to innermost Kritias goes through $map:02020018$, $map:02020037$, and $map:02020035$, but Tairen has fortified all of these positions. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021703$ in $map:02020018$, $npcNamePlural:25022105$ in $map:02020037$, and $npcNamePlural:25021905$ in $map:02020035$.
quest.descFameUI: Tairen is holding several key routes through Kritias. Defeat them to secure the routes.

quest.name: Breaking Through
quest.desc: $map:02020018$ and $map:02020037$ appear to be gateways to the furthest reaches of Kritias. Help Sky Fortress's agents break through by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021702$ in $map:02020018$ and $npcNamePlural:25022102$ in $map:02020037$.
quest.descFameUI: Make way to the furthest reaches of Kritias by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021702$ in $map:02020018$ and $npcNamePlural:25022102$ in $map:02020037$.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000154$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ needs to study inert monsters to better understand how to fight them. Capture a $item:61000154$ from $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: Capture $item:61000154$ in $map:02020031$ to help expand Sky Fortress's research efforts.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000155$
quest.desc: Sky Fortress continues its research on pacified monsters. Capture a $item:61000155$ in $map:02020006$.
quest.descFameUI: Capture $item:61000155$ in $map:02020006$ to help expand Sky Fortress's research efforts.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000159$
quest.desc: The monsters in $map:02020001$ look similar to the monsters of Maple World. Go to $map:02020001$ and capture a $item:61000159$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020001$ and capture a $item:61000159$.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000161$
quest.desc: The researchers of Sky Fortress need yet another monster to prove their new hypothesis. This time they need a $item:61000161$ from $map:02020034$.
quest.descFameUI: The researchers of Sky Fortress need yet another monster to prove their new hypothesis. This time they need a $item:61000161$ from $map:02020034$.

quest.name: Secrets of the Leshies
quest.desc: Unlike the other monsters of Kritias, leshies don't have much aetherine in their bodies. Instead, they wear aetherine pendants that they use for power. Could humans learn how to use this power? Collect $itemPlural:30001303$ from $npcNamePlural:25020901$ and $npcNamePlural:25020902$ in $map:02020013$.
quest.descFameUI: Leshies get power from the $itemPlural:30001303$ around their necks. Collect some for research.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000164$
quest.desc: Sky Fortress is turning its efforts on researching unusual monsters. Help the research by capturing $itemPlural:61000164$ in $map:02020051$.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress is researching unique monsters. Help the research by capturing $itemPlural:61000164$ in $map:02020051$.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000165$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ asked you to capture a $item:61000165$ from $map:02020033$.
quest.descFameUI: Capture a $item:61000165$ from $map:02020033$ for the Sky Fortress research team.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000170$
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress research team needs a $item:61000170$ from $map:02020033$ for their experiments.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress is continuing its research on the monsters of Kritias. Go to $map:02020033$ and capture a $item:61000170$ to help with their research.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000166$
quest.desc: There is still a little more work to be done in the research on Kritias's monsters. Capture a $item:61000166$ in $map:02020018$ for the research team.
quest.descFameUI: There is still a little more work to be done in the research on Kritias's monsters. Capture a $item:61000166$ in $map:02020018$ for the research team.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000169$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ needs you to capture a $item:61000169$ in $map:02020037$.
quest.descFameUI: Help the research team by capturing a $item:61000169$ in $map:02020037$.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000163$
quest.desc: One of the researchers accidentally let one of their monster specimens escape. Capture a replacement $item:61000163$ in $map:02020009$.
quest.descFameUI: One of the researchers accidentally let one of their monster specimens escape. Capture a replacement $item:61000163$ in $map:02020009$.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000168$
quest.desc: Capture a $item:61000168$ in $map:02020008$. Don't worry; it's gentle.
quest.descFameUI: Capture a $item:61000168$ in $map:02020008$ for Sky Fortress's research team.

quest.name: Aetherine Source
quest.desc: A strange pit was discovered in $map:02020029$. $npcName:11004312$ believes that the monsters of $map:02020029$ get power from that pit. Enter $map:52100111$ in $map:02020029$ and search for a source of aetherine.
quest.manual: Search $map:52100111$ in $map:02020029$ for a source of aetherine
quest.descFameUI: Enter $map:52100111$ in $map:02020029$ and search for a source of aetherine.

quest.name: Seeking the $map:52100113$
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020302$ are overwhelming $map:02020006$. $npcName:11004312$ wants to cut them off at their source. Enter the $map:52100113$ near the bridge in $map:02020006$ and get rid of their eggs.
quest.manual: Enter the $map:52100113$ in $map:02020006$ and destroy leecher eggs
quest.descFameUI: Enter the $map:52100113$ near the bridge in $map:02020006$ and get rid of their eggs.

quest.name: $map:02020033$'s Cannons
